titleStmt.title: The last speeches of the two ministers Mr. John King, and Mr. John Kid, [brace] at the place of execution at Edenburgh on the 14th day of August, 1679.
titleStmt.author: King, John, d. 1679.
Kid, John, d. 1679.

notesStmt.note: Separate t.p. for speech by John Kid, dated 1679.
Imperfect: print show-through; torn, begining-page 11 of defective Huntington Library copy spliced at end.
Reproduction of original in the Bodleian Library.
